    LC第311场周赛

    AuraroJ 2022/9/18

    # 一、最小偶倍数 (opens new window)

    class Solution {
    public int smallestEvenMultiple(int n) {
        return n % 2 == 0 ? n : n * 2;
    }
}
    1
    2

    # 二、最长的字母序连续子字符串的长度 (opens new window)

    class Solution {
    public int longestContinuousSubstring(String s) {
        int n = s.length();
        int res = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            int j = i;
            while(j + 1 < n && s.charAt(j + 1) - s.charAt(j) == 1) {
                j++;
            }
            res = Math.max(res, j - i + 1);
        }
        return res;
    }
}
    1

    # 三、反转二叉树的奇数层 (opens new window)

    /**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * public class TreeNode {
 *     int val;
 *     TreeNode left;
 *     TreeNode right;
 *     TreeNode() {}
 *     TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; }
 *     TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) {
 *         this.val = val;
 *         this.left = left;
 *         this.right = right;
 *     }
 * }
 */
//BFS
class Solution {
    public TreeNode reverseOddLevels(TreeNode root) {
        if(root == null) return root;
        List<TreeNode> que = new ArrayList<>();
        que.add(root);
        int depth = 0;
        while (que.size() > 0) {
            List<TreeNode> que1 = new ArrayList<>();
            int size = que.size();
            for(int i = 0; i < size; i++){
                TreeNode node = que.get(i);
                if(node.left != null){  //左
                    que1.add(node.left);
                }
                if(node.right != null){  //右
                    que1.add(node.right);
                }
            }
            if(depth % 2 != 0) {
                for(int i = 0, j = que.size() - 1; i < j; i++, j--) {
                    int tem = que.get(i).val;
                    que.get(i).val = que.get(j).val;
                    que.get(j).val = tem;
                }
            }
            que = que1;
            depth++;
        }
        return root;
    }
}


//DFS
class Solution {
    int N = 15;
    List<Integer>[] tem = new List[N];

    public TreeNode reverseOddLevels(TreeNode root) {
        if(root == null) return root;
        for(int i = 0; i < N; i++) tem[i] = new ArrayList<>();
        dfs1(root, 0);
        dfs2(root, 0);
        return root;
    }
    public void dfs1(TreeNode root, int depth){
        if(root == null) return;
        tem[depth].add(root.val);
        dfs1(root.left, depth + 1);
        dfs1(root.right, depth + 1);
    }
    public void dfs2(TreeNode root, int depth) {
        if(root == null) return;
        if(depth % 2 != 0) {
            root.val = tem[depth].get(tem[depth].size() - 1);
            tem[depth].remove(tem[depth].size() - 1);
        }
        dfs2(root.left, depth + 1);
        dfs2(root.right, depth + 1);
    }
}

    # 四、字符串的前缀分数和 (opens new window)

    //前缀树
class Solution {
    
    public int[] sumPrefixScores(String[] words) {
        int n = words.length;
        int[] ans = new int[n];
        Trie root = new Trie();
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            root.insert(words[i]);
        }
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            String s = words[i];
            ans[i] = root.search(s);
        }
        return ans;
    }
}
class Trie {
    Node node;
    public Trie() {
        node = new Node();
    }
    
    public void insert(String word) {
        Node p = node;
        for(int i = 0; i < word.length(); i++){
            int u = word.charAt(i) - 'a';
            if(p.son[u] == null) p.son[u] = new Node();
            p = p.son[u];
            p.val += 1;
        }
    }
    
    public int search(String word) {
        Node p = node;
        int score = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i < word.length(); i++){
            int u = word.charAt(i) - 'a';
            p = p.son[u];
            score += p.val;
        }
        return score;
    }
    
   
}
class Node{
    int val;
    Node[] son = new Node[26];
    Node(){
        for(int i = 0; i < 26; i++){
            son[i] = null;
        }
    }
}


//字符串哈希1
class Solution {
    int N = 1010, P = 131;//P代表转为P进制
    long[] h = new long[N];
    long[] p = new long[N];
    public int[] sumPrefixScores(String[] words) {
        //字符串哈希
        int n = words.length;
        Map<Long, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
        //左侧为高位
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            char[] a = words[i].toCharArray();
            Arrays.fill(h, 0);
            Arrays.fill(p, 0);
            p[0] = 1;
            for(int j = 1; j <= a.length; j++){
                h[j] = (h[j - 1] * P + a[j - 1]) % Long.MAX_VALUE;//h[]是字符串前缀
                map.put(h[j], map.getOrDefault(h[j], 0) + 1);
                p[j] = p[j - 1] * P;//p[]保存指数
            }
        }
        int[] res = new int[n];
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            char[] a = words[i].toCharArray();
            long ans = 0;
            Arrays.fill(h, 0);
            Arrays.fill(p, 0);
            p[0] = 1;
            for(int j = 1; j <= a.length; j++) {
                h[j] = (h[j - 1] * P + a[j - 1]) % Long.MAX_VALUE;//h[]是字符串前缀
                ans += map.get(h[j]);
                p[j] = p[j - 1] * P;//p[]保存指数
            }
            res[i] = (int)ans;
        }
        return res;

    }
}


//字符串哈希2
class Solution {
    int N = 1010, P = 131;//P代表转为P进制
 
    public int[] sumPrefixScores(String[] words) {
        //字符串哈希
        int n = words.length;
        
        Map<Long, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
        //左侧为高位
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            char[] a = words[i].toCharArray();
            long h = 0;
            for(char c : a){
                h = h * P + c;
                map.put(h, map.getOrDefault(h, 0) + 1);
            }
        }
        int[] res = new int[n];
        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){
            char[] a = words[i].toCharArray();
            long ans = 0;
            long h = 0;
            for(char c : a){
                h = h * P + c;
                ans += map.get(h);
            }
            res[i] = (int)ans;
        }
        return res;

    }
}
